subject: Little League World Series
Baseball
Children and Youth
Immigration and Emigration
lead_paragraph: The denial of visas was a sad end to an inspirational story of a fledgling program for poor children who hoped to test their skills against the best teams in the world.
snippet: The denial of visas was a sad end to an inspirational story of a fledgling program for poor children who hoped to test their skills against the best teams in the world.
